website_summaries.verdict: This curtain-style model is an excellent alternative to a conventional fireplace screen.
pros: Made in the USA, this screen is extremely well-crafted and durable—will last for many years to come
Ideal for non-standard fireplaces that aren't well-suited to freestanding models
Users praise its quality for the price
cons: You'll need to mount a rod above the fireplace to hang this screen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My screen was over 30 years old, rusty and tangled. In 5 minutes ( after I figured out I needed to remove 1 sheet metal screw to free the rod), I replaced the old one and have a new, black, smooth operating screen. If I'd known it was this easy, I would have done this years ago. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: thomas j. stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This product is inexpensive and easy to assemble (don't forget to purchase the curtain rod). This is my first home with a fireplace and I wanted to get something to screen the fire from my dog and other objects and it works great! I recommend to get a size 1" smaller to accommodate for the spacing for the rod. I also must add that their customer service is outstanding. They are very courteous, focused on your needs and makes sure that you are taken care of. I strongly recommend this to any homeowner that has a fireplace. It's great quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: An-Marie Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: the smoothness of operation lasted a few weeks.  got progressively worse.
customer_reviews.text: didn't last one season. irngs would drag. spring like handles, came of or tangled in the wires of the others. some rings soon came off. spirals come out at bottom, hang and pull out further. lasted part of first winter season. next winter reversed and mounted upside down and got another half season from them. Good idea that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: tfansoi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit & Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. I was also pleased that the measuring guide was accurate. I measured 19" for my Marco fireplace curtains, and this product fit perfectly. I also took sandpaper to the metal rods while I had it off... They glide so we'll!
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: relatively simple fix for an old screen.
customer_reviews.text: Its a big improvement over my old bent up one. Pros: Well packaged. Clear instructions. Sturdy. Cons: Was a bit thicker than old one so had to drill a new screw hole in The surround to spread the rods further apart so the screen could bypass. Was not pristine - a few minor kinks in the screen. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: fireplace screen looking a little shabby?  Get this and spruce up the hearth!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely pleased as all get out with this screen. My wife was thrilled I finally replaced our old screen which was discolored and falling off the rails. Easy to install. Remove the rods, slide the rings over the rods, put in place, screw in the rod and Voila! good as new. Well built in the USA as things should be.
customer_reviews.author: DeepDishorThin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect I did the measurements for 2 in smaller than the height of fireplace opening as I did not have anything I added some angle iron at the bottom and I bought a quarter inch round steel Rod by 36in in Long from Home Depot that is what I used to hold my curtain up I just drilled a quarter inch hole on either side of the fireplace opening and welded a flat piece of Steel at the top
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Good size choices
customer_reviews.text: Our original screen was a little short which made it difficult to open & close as it would jam on a ledge. I ordered this screen 1" longer and it's a very good fit. The overall quality is very good - look and feel, fairly easy to install, once I figured there was a bracket & screw in the middle that holds the rods up.
customer_reviews.author: Doug J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Hubby ordered as we headed into fall. After we had fireplace inspected, they suggested we add to ensure no wood or debris flew out while burning, for safety. Little tedious to install, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on my fire place!
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace screen is good quality and nice! I read some reviews on here saying they were bad quality? I don’t understand why they would say that! I love them and they are good quality and easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: SaiBerMaster

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace looks migggghty fine again.
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased a new house and the prior owners appear to have used the original mesh screen on the fireplace as a soccer goal. Measured this up, ordered, two screws each curtain, and boom. Brilliant. I do recommend this. Price is right, quality seems to be right on point.
customer_reviews.author: AllenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: 21" one are labeled 22"
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 1 star only because the person whom labeled these put the wrong size on the label. There for I got the wrong size. I didn't want to reorder because I figured these are all labeled the wrong size. If you are ordering the 21" you will most likely get the 22" ones like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, but stiffer than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Bought a mesh screen that was the exact size of my fireplace, but since you mount the rod slightly lower, you would need a slightly smaller mesh for a perfect fit. The curtain is rather stiff and doesnt "give" at all, so it has to be a perfect fit. Doesnt allow for slack at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Timhuang24

customer_reviews.title: Really looks great on the fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This was an inexpensive addition to the gas logs we have. We wanted something so the grandkids or dogs would not get burned. This really works and looks great. Wish we would have done it a lot sooner.
customer_reviews.author: tammy young

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This chain is good although it does not quite stretch as far as it says. A little shorter hanging but fit my slightly smaller opening well.
customer_reviews.author: discipleman

customer_reviews.title: Suggestion for product improvement
customer_reviews.text: Ordering and shipping were excellent as per my previous post. I would he preferred the screen mounted with round rings rather than the D-rings used. My screen rod is in a channel and the d-ring causes bunching of the screen that impedes smooth operation. Not a show stopper, just a preference.
customer_reviews.author: steve d osborne

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality
customer_reviews.text: Both the vendor and the product were excellent. Do the measurements and order them, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Socrates

customer_reviews.title: a little tedious but great result
customer_reviews.text: an inch too big but the only brass one I could find. so I spent a few minutes setting new hooks in the mesh and hanging by those. a little tedious but great result. Delivered fast, in good condition. nice product.
customer_reviews.author: pat costello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Quality shines through and through with these replacement screens! They make the fireplace look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: NEED SPACERS, otherwise nice.
customer_reviews.text: Installed yesterday; was easy to install and looks nice BUT the spacers were not included so it doesn't open and close as nicely as it should. Hence three stars. If the vendor could provide spacers as noted in the installation instructions it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: LTubbe

customer_reviews.title: Well made and exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: The mesh screens arrived exactly as described. The length was perfect, though I measured the old ones a few times before ordering. They’re super easy to install as well. Haven’t had more than 10 fires in the fireplace, so I can’t really comment much on durability. They seem well made though, so I’m guessing I’ll get years of service out of them. Either way, I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Needed to get new hanging fireplace screen after 50 years of very hard use, old one looked almost melted. Was very pleased that replacement parts were available. Received replacement screen quickly and was fairly easy to attach to existing hooks on old bracket bar, which we polished. Result was very attractive, safe, fast, and economical.
customer_reviews.author: linda fields

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I went round and round with fireplace stores and home improvement stores about purchasing a new mesh screen. Finally said the heck with it and checked out Amazon. The package came fast. installation was a breeze and they look fantastic. I did think the screens were kind of spendy, but whatevs. They are awesome! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sleek feel mesh screen
customer_reviews.text: My old screen would get hung up and was separating. This was easy to install and the feel of the new screen helps to update my 35 year old fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: lv2teach

customer_reviews.title: Works good but...
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy enough but they failed to mention that this ran on a rod instead of a t-track which I had so I had to MacGyver a rail system out of steel rod and some braces for a shelf system other than that it works good but it fails to keep in the embers that happened to burst out which was the main goal of this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brandon desmarest

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband around 10 min to remove our old mesh screen and replace it with this one. It works perfectly and looks great. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Crane

customer_reviews.title: Fit my old firebox with measuring tips
customer_reviews.text: Fit my old firebox as expected. Original firebox from 1983 when house was originally built. I followed their measuring instructions and it fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite 48"
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to be two 24" wide panels, but they measured at 23" wide, even when stretched. Maybe not a big deal for some, but for our needs, we needed the full 48" width for our fireplace so we are returning. Otherwise, the look is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly R.

customer_reviews.title: The Heat is ON !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value - high quality mesh screen that fit perfectly, and arrived on time. Simple installation, and highly accurate dimensions. Great supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking screen
customer_reviews.text: Great looking screen, pull handles are cheap looking and way too small. Made my own out of 3/8" aluminum rods and covered them with leather.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific fireplace screen
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-made fireplace screen. It was an exact fit to our fireplace, and easy to install. This should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: T.G. 51

customer_reviews.title: Look Good And Work well with the Valence.
customer_reviews.text: I installed these along with a new log set. They were easy to install and worked well with the valance. No tools were required for the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Renos 4 Pros & Joes

customer_reviews.title: The screen was exactly what I needed to fill in ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen was exactly what I needed to fill in the front of my fireplace. However, it seems more expensive than necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey but at least I found one
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working pretty good so far, I used it for what it supposed to be used for, the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Fort

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to install but that might be more our fireplace than the screen. Works exactly as it should. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: the screen is good when installed correctly but it came with no directions ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was right on the money, the screen is good when installed correctly but it came with no directions so it took me a while to put it up
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen!
customer_reviews.text: Just what i expected, a heavy duty fireplace screen that keeps the embers in the fireplace and not jumping out onto the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett Van Gorp

customer_reviews.title: You need a hammer drill if you have stone or brick
customer_reviews.text: If you followed the instructions on ordering as I did, the screen will be at least 2 or 3 inches short.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Likes...exactly what we needed. Good value Dislikes...curtain gets very hot making it difficult to close the curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Betty R. Moisant

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a house that already had a screen like this. It was so easy to install and is very good quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb G88

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this because I ordered 2 inches to long I am ordering another
customer_reviews.author: Darleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice spark screen
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Arrived a day earlier than estimated. Screen is sturdy. Hanging rings are ‘D’ shaped and the handles are a little short making it a little difficult to open and close. Other than that looks very nice and works well.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: After ordering an incorrect size screen, was allowed to return and reorder the correct size - was fully credited for the returned screen promptly. Screen was easy to install and looks nice! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple replacement screen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for original fireplace screen. Easy to install. Should have done this a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: PHG

customer_reviews.title: It works and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to install when it came to putting it into the fireplace. You had to lay on your back, practically in the fireplace with your head lifted, using tools and a flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Anita McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Do easy
customer_reviews.text: So easy. Not sure why I waited so long. Slides easily and smoothly
customer_reviews.author: tracy howard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect return process
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back the first one as I ordered the wrong size! Perfect return process.... returned and reordered the correct size(this one) with no issues. New screen fits like a dream. Our fireplace looks brand new now. Very happy with whole process!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: High-quality product
customer_reviews.text: High quality materials, works well with rod and looks high-end
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but unfortunately didn’t work for our outdoor fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: DMAN

customer_reviews.title: Received as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Item works just fine for our fireplace and it doesn't take away from the view much.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a defective screen on a new fireplace. This replacement actually looked better than the factory screen.?
customer_reviews.author: Darryll Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy fix
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fix of our fireplace, easy to install. We had people come in and wanted to replace the whole door, this fix made it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Steer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what we wanted and it arrived quickly, but the instructions were not easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: bevanne

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Good overall quality, however would like to see the "D" rings black not chrome. The chrome makes it look cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Screens curled at bottom where they meet causing them to not hang even in the middle
customer_reviews.author: Ace chimney

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, because I measured wrong. Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie myers

customer_reviews.title: Great value & love the look!
customer_reviews.text: We were happy to find exactly what we needed. Previous home owners removed screen from fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: added a very nice touch to the fireplace in my 75 yr old ...
customer_reviews.text: added a very nice touch to the fireplace in my 75 yr old home furnished with antiques. Fit right in. Nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Screens were easy to install and are very durable - looking forward to many fires this fall/winter with these in place. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rivard

customer_reviews.title: Easy.
customer_reviews.text: Saved us a lot of money. We thought we would have to replace the entire unit but this product solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: wrong size ordered 31inch and got 29 inch
customer_reviews.text: seems like good product with good quality to materials but getting wrong size is frustrating I measured twice and they should as well!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Olmsted

customer_reviews.title: New fire place screens
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have is with the things that pull the screens. That is to say they are to short for my fire place.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have known how easy and simple this was to fix years ago
customer_reviews.text: We have had a broken, mangled chain screen for years. Wish I would have known how easy and simple this was to fix years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feedback
customer_reviews.text: It was indicated that handles would be cold to touch. Not so. Only disappointing feature so far.
customer_reviews.author: Thad Kalmanowicz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed product, easy to install, great replacement to original screen
customer_reviews.author: ConnieP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It was super easy to install a d it looks amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: susan sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and now have a new fireplace screen
customer_reviews.author: Randy R.

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Hardware not right. Instructions worse. Makes no sense. Needs photos to show where and how. Rods bind when put in the way described. STAY AWAY !
customer_reviews.author: writermom

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great very well constructed easy to install thanks
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great very well constructed easy to install thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK But difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: The curtain rings turned out to be D rings and would not fit over the crtain rod
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the old rusty, uneven screen I had. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product screen, would order again if needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcie Vitorelo

customer_reviews.title: Our fireplace is 36x23 high didn't have to cut new screen sides tucked in. .
customer_reviews.text: Liked web page all the info you need and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Czisny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to intstall and fit better than the original
customer_reviews.text: Easy to intstall and fit better than the original. Only problem it didn't come with the side clips to hold it in place
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to install, fits nicely and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable-handles could be more heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Acceptable for what it is. Handles are a little flimsy but will do the job. Not sure how to they will last over time with repeated pushing/pulling and heat from the fire.
customer_reviews.author: P K M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and well made, glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: William Danley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mesh curtain is high quality and easy to install and great price, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a good price
customer_reviews.text: I tried the competitor but the pant was all flaking off. This one only had a coupl missing spots and was cut much more evenly than another USA made brand. Maybe they all come from the same place but I'm satisfied with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rancho Guy 4

customer_reviews.title: Screen looks perfect except it is a tad too short
customer_reviews.text: Screen looks perfect except it is a tad too short. The curtain is a big improvement compared to the old screen which was falling apart and hanging off the rod since it was torn. The curtain would look nicer if it was 1 inch longer but I don't think they make them this length. Very well made mesh screen curtain.
customer_reviews.author: SUZE

customer_reviews.title: DREADFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Dreadful waste of time and money. We measured twice alright, but the thing is junk with no way to make the rods we also purchased function. You simply can not find any way to install it so that it functions. We are experienced DIY people and also sought advice from 2 pro guys. None of us could make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! Slides easily. Better than original!
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace the inside walls of our fireplace because it was cracked. We decided it was time to replace the bent up mesh metal curtains. Measure very carefully! I had to return them for one inch longer. These were easy to install. Once they were up, my husband keeps commenting on how smoothly they work, how COOL to the touch they remain, and how nicely they fit. The mesh is pretty tight to avoid sparks, tighter than our originals. We are very happy with this purchase and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Oscar

customer_reviews.title: love it - but it didn't come with hooks - ...
customer_reviews.text: love it - but it didn't come with hooks - DOH!!! - so I went through 3 iterations of hooks from the hardware store till i finally found ones that worked well and didn't overclutch the bar. I ultimately ordered these: yueton 60pcs Black Metal Hook Clips Hanging... yea! they worked great!!! This mesh screen should come with hooks or recommend hooks!!!! My frustration in wasted money on hooks that were fiddly, painful, and frustrating to install that didn't work was ultimately rewarded by the hooks i mention above. You guys should partner and save us all some pain!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: It Fit!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our fireplace screen with this and it fit. Be very careful to LOOK how the fireplace bracket is arranged before you unscrew it because the right and left screen handles have to pull together with one in front of the other. You have to know how to screw the bracket back in or else you can't close the screen properly. Close pins helped keep the screens from sliding while I was messing with it.
customer_reviews.author: wyotx

customer_reviews.title: Screens are not 24" wide as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I, as many other people probably do too, have a 48" wide fireplace... so you'd hope that a package that contains two 24" wide screens would be perfect. However, the screens one is shipped are 23 or 23.5" wide so there is going to gap somewhere, and you *know* a spark is going to find that gap! I am still in the return window so if i find ones that are truly 24" wide i'll be returning these and getting those. I may still return these if i cannot find a way to stretch them to 24". Really unimpressed. Seriously, how many more 0.01$ would it cost to make it the correct size?
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Creaser

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for my fireplace and was easy to install. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Only one month of use causes loops to detach
customer_reviews.text: I like that it was easy to install, simply thread the loops on the bar. However, the handles come separate and since the directions are useless, I didn't have pliers to use to attach the rings to the mesh like the loops you use on car keys. Worst part is that after about a month of use, several loops detached from the mesh on both panels. So to fix I have to uninstall the whole from of my fireplace or live with the middle few inches of mesh being useless.
customer_reviews.author: BrazingtonBlurb

customer_reviews.title: Easy DIY
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 35 yo rusted screen with this one. Also the handles were no longer attached. One screw supported the hanging rod but it was tricky to get to. Once removed the new curtain slides right on. Reattaching the rod was tricky because of the mounting screw but it looks and works great. I wish the new included handles were longer. I used the old ones instead.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement
customer_reviews.text: My 35 year old fireplace mesh curtain was rusty, bent and tangled. This new one is perfect, has a nice quality finish and was easy to install. (Except for attaching the little hanging pulls, which was a pain in the @$$.) The size matches the old ones exactly; opening and closing the curtains is now very smooth. This was an easy and inexpensive upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Frog Man

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for original screens
customer_reviews.text: My old screen was badly warped from years of use and this appeared like an excellent solution. The only hesitation I had was that my old screens were 11” x 16” and the closest these came was 11” x 24”. I decided to take a chance that they would work anyway, and I’m pleased to say they work perfectly. They fold so compactly that the fireplace opening is just as large as the original. I’m delighted with these.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Green

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20 year old fireplace.I wrestled with the screen which was twisted, stretched and falling apart for too mnay years because I thought the screen was part of the doors and didn't know it could be changed. Easy install..fits perfectly and rides smoothly on the rod. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: tdmchris

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, installs per instructions and perfectly complements a 1920's brick fireplace. Requires basic handyman skills to install, it is easy, but if you do not already have an impact drill it might make sense to just hire someone with the tools for the 1/2 hour it takes to install rather than buy the drill and bit.
customer_reviews.author: otis

customer_reviews.title: Now my cat won't light her tail on fire.  Yay!
customer_reviews.text: It works as described, and keeps the fire where it ought to be (note: I use propane, so I can't really comment on sparks flying). I used a steel rod from lowe's to hold the screen up and it works well enough as long as it's supported in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Such an improvement over the screen that was here when we bought the house. The old curtain had kinks and was difficult to close. This curtain flows smoothly and has a nice black finish on it. I measured as instructed and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Whispurrs

customer_reviews.title: Please read instructions through and then measure 3 times.
customer_reviews.text: My knees and make sure measurements are right and wear knee pads and get a good masonry bit. Use lights for seeing I wore a head lamp and some emergency lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Ann Stryker

customer_reviews.title: The brass is not to brassy, just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. The antique brass is perfect, it’s not a solid brass look just has a hint of the brass on angels. The screen slides smoothly. I asked two guys doing work on the home next door if I could pay them to put it up and it took them 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Look for a sturdier set up with a better design
customer_reviews.text: The rod installation is extremely difficult and the screen will not properly close to cover the fireplace
customer_reviews.author: Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace most of the things for our fireplace. This was one of the things we bought and it was a very good price and a good quality product
customer_reviews.author: Mimix5

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Looks great! Much better than my old cheap mesh screen the builder put on.
customer_reviews.author: CESL01

customer_reviews.title: Cheap screen. Sorry I spent 50 dollars
customer_reviews.text: This screen has fallen apart. The side has been unraveling. The top has loosened. After a few months over a year old I am going to have to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Galen W. Nelson

product_meta.title: Midwest Hearth Fireplace Mesh Screen Curtain 22" High. Two 24" Wide Panels. Made in USA (Black)
product_meta.description:
Size:22"H x 24"W| Color:BlackFeatures:

• All-steel construction (Black, Brass, Bronze).
• All stainless steel construction (Stainless Steel).
• Zinc phosphate undercoating for maximum corrosion protection and paint adherence (Black, Brass, Bronze)
• Powdercoated finish provides durability and heat resistance (Black, Brass, Bronze).
• Strong 19 gauge wire woven into 1/4" interlocking spiral panels.
• Helps to prevent sparks from damaging your carpet or hearth.
• Made in the USA by expert wire craftsmen.

How to Measure:

☑ All replacement screen sets include (2) 24" wide panels to fit a fireplace opening up to 48" wide.
☑ Screen height does not include the height of the hanging rings. The included hanging rings add 1/2" to the height of the screen.
☑ Replacing an existing screen: Measure the height and width of the existing screen (not including the hanger rings) and order the same height screen.
☑ Adding a screen to an existing rod: Measure the height of your fireplace opening and subtract 1-inch. (1/2" for ring height + 1/2" for bottom clearance).
☑ Purchasing screen with an adjustable rod & valance kit: Measure the height of your fireplace opening and subtract 2-inches.

Included:

• 2 Screen panels (each 24" wide)
• 2 Screen pulls
• Hanging rings (pre-installed)

Satisfaction & Quality Guarantee:

• 365 Day Quality Guarantee.
• 365 Day Complete Satisfaction Guarantee.
• 365 Day Exchange or Return for a full refund.
feature_bullets: BEAUTY: Add the finishing touch to your home decor with a beautiful Midwest Hearth fireplace screen. An elegant weave and designer finish complete your custom look.
SAFETY: Keep the fire inside your fireplace. The high quality mesh curtains help prevent sparks from damaging your carpet or hearth.
HEAVY DUTY: Strong 19 gauge wire woven into 1/4" interlocking spiral panels. Woven by wire craftsman in the USA.
MAXIMUM CORROSION PROTECTION: Zinc phosphate undercoating for maximum corrosion protection and paint adherence.
TWO (2) PANELS INCLUDED: Each panel is 24" inches wide and includes rings and matching screen pulls. Hanging rod and valance sold separately.
